metadata.title: Ukraine Pride Vintage Ukrainian T-Shirt Unisex for Men and Women
features: Ukraine trident Flag t-shirt made with great fabric: 100% cotton. This graphic tee will make a best gift idea for him or her; husband; kids; male; man; mom; mother; parents; seniors; adults; aunt; boys; brother; children; dad; daughter; father; female; girls; grandfather; grandma; grandmother; grandpa; sister; son; student; teacher; teens; wife; woman; uncle.

Men's ukraine shirt featuring double-needle sleeves and hem with a taped neck and shoulders. This shirt is a men's or women's ukrainian shirt will not only fit comfortably and retain its shape for years. It will also be a great conversation starter if you wear this shirt outdoors; exercising; running; at parties; school; college or sleeping.

Ukrainian t-shirt printed with industry leading techniques and premium inks to ensure highest quality and durability. Colors won't fade or crack or peel. Machine wash cold. Use non-chlorine bleach only.

Ukraine flag shirt men and women will love to wear to show their pride and support for ukraine. This ukraine shirt features the ukraine coat of arms and it is designed and printed in the United States.
description: We hope you will love this Ukraine t-shirt. Comfortable, durable, machine washable.
